relics.name: Freaky
relics.description: At the start of each combat, summon a Dummy with 6 HP. If it dies, add 2 Keys into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Wait, I thought it was a free key!

relics.name: Block Key
relics.description: At the start of each combat, summon a Dummy with 12 HP. If it dies, gain 8 Block.
relics.flavorText: Why is it a key? Because I'm lazy at art.

relics.name: Unlocker
relics.description: At the start of each combat, remove all Locks from a random Locked card.

relics.name: Anti Key
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, Lock 3 random cards.

relics.name: Gremlin Horn???
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

relics.name: Very Freaky
relics.description:
Replaces Freaky.
At the start of even numbered turns, summon a Dummy with 6 HP. If one dies, add 2 Keys into your hand.

relics.name: Empty Key
relics.description:
Raise your maximum hand size by 5.
At the start of each combat, add 1 Key into your hand.

keywords.name: Crippled
keywords.description: An enemy is Crippled if it has both Weak and Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Equalize
keywords.description: If the enemy has Weak, apply 1 Vulnerable. If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.

keywords.name: Hexx
keywords.description: Hexxed creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: May only be played by paying the additional cost of Exhausting Keys from your hand from left to right.

mods.name: Vex Collection - Locksmith
mods.description: A mysterious locksmith with nefarious plans. Ascends the Spire in search of greater powers. Part of the Old Vex Mods Collection. Originally uploaded June 2nd, 2020.
